- BLT shouldn't be distributed without formal agreement from NetFishers

- BLT is free of charge.
- BLT is distributed "as is", without warranty. NetFishers people can't be
  held responsible for any damage caused to your devices or you network by the
  usage of BLT.
- BLT and NetFishers have no relationship with the network device vendors.
